Summary: top of hill pointed west infront and abovelots of windows and aliens
trends: There have been no other sightings in new jersey,pennsylvania l
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsit was like a spinning top but the bottom not pointed, lots of multicolored lights.lots of see through windows at top.at least 15 or 20 aliens unlike the standard look, they were half human and half standard look,full bodies,beautiful looking creatures all moving about and communicating what ever,all had the same light colored outfits and all the lights constantly moving,all windows seem to be moving or turning separatly from the bottom . the bottom then had a long yellow light dropping to the ground and a small stepside ford or chev pickup lowered slowly to the ground and disappeared over the hill ahead and ufo then disappeared and i followed to find it and could not find.but at the bottom of the hill daylight stunned me and it was 630 am.i dont know where the night went.the man in the pickup i never did find and thats my story,i was driving for ffe trucking out of denver colorado.the lady in the sleeper or secong driver was asleep then awoke and told me to turn that dam xx cken light off daxxxmmt.I said i didnt turn it on.Ipulled over to some restaurant i dont remember,i donot have any photosbut i also dont know how to put a drawing in to show you but i can draw what i saw.for someone and since then i have people ive never seen seem to follow me and when i look to notice i dont see them anymore. the reason i havent told anyone is because its just another back then ,something nice to read but not believable.the last sighting was by CARR Colorado.3 cigar shaped ufos foating high above us at about 4 or 5 pm on cold partly cloudy day.we all looked at each other and passed it off,took a left turn onto highway 85 and headed home to greeley and kingsburg back to the oil rig.
